entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
